name: Burn Then Pillage!
description:
Created for the #LowRezJam 2020 https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2020 this was based on a bumper sticker that said: "Remember: Pillage THEN Burn".

Originally an idea for the C64 for the simple nature of the game I decided to use it for the LowRezJam entry simply because it'll work on a small grid. However, I did use C64 colors for the game just to get the same feel.

Controls:

PGUp/PgDown to scale the screen (starts in 64/64 due to the jam)

1-0 Keys to fast zoom. Recommend 5 for most screens

Arrow keys to move. You can move crates/barrels/chests. Avoid fire.

Obstacles can't be moved.

Move objects to the dirt path to get a score. Move yourself there to GTFO and generate a new map.

You can use objects to snuff out fires.

The fire spreads so balance loot with getting out fast!
